        public static java.lang.String mergePdfToFileLink​(java.util.List<java.io.File> fileList,
                                                  java.lang.String fileName)
                                           throws java.io.IOException
        Merge pdf, then return the webservice url to the created file.
        Parameters:
        fileList - a list of files to merge
        fileName - the name of the created file
        Returns:
        the link to the file
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - if mergePdfToFileLink fails to write the new file.

      • mergePdf

        public static java.io.File mergePdf​(java.util.List<java.io.File> fileList)
                             throws java.io.IOException
        Append multiple PDF files into one PDF.
        Parameters:
        fileList - a list of path of PDF files to merge.
        Returns:
        The link to access the generated PDF.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - if mergePdf fails to write the new file.
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if the fileList is empty.

        fileName - the file name
        Returns:

      • printCopiesToFile

        public static java.io.File printCopiesToFile​(java.io.File file,
                                             int copyNumber)
                                      throws java.io.IOException
        Allows to get a PDF with multiple copies.
        Parameters:
        file - the PDF to copy
        copyNumber - the number of copies
        Returns:
        a new file with the number of asked copies.
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if copy number is inferior or equal to 0.
        java.io.IOException - if mergePdf fails to write the new file.
